🎉 **New Feature: Set In Stone**

Dear SixFocus users,

We’re excited to announce that version 1.2.5 introduces a brand new **Set in Stone** option for completed tasks. When you enable this option, the task is marked as fully complete, won’t count toward your 6-task limit, and becomes unmodifiable. Rest assured, we’ve overhauled our data structure to preserve your local data, so there’s no need to worry about any data loss.

Thank you for your ongoing support and trust in SixFocus. We hope this update brings enhanced efficiency and peace of mind to your daily workflow. May your tasks be ever manageable and your days filled with success and joy!

Best regards,
The SixFocus Team

🙏 **Important Notice Regarding the Next Update**

Dear users,

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Due to structural changes in the data system, **your local data will not be accessible after the next update**. However, if iCloud is enabled, your existing data will be retrieved through **CloudKit** shortly after the update. ☁️

To prevent any unexpected issues, we kindly ask that you **manually back up any important information** before updating. While we are doing our best to ensure a smooth transition, we want to be cautious and transparent about potential risks. 🔄

We deeply appreciate your understanding and support. Thank you for using SixFocus, and we will continue working to improve your experience. ❤️

Best regards,  
The SixFocus Team

Why Six Tasks? The Idea Behind SixFocus🚀

The concept of the 'six-task rule' is most famously known as the **Ivy Lee Method**. In 1918, productivity consultant **Ivy Lee** introduced this method to steel magnate **Charles M. Schwab**. It’s a simple yet effective system: **write down the six most important tasks for the day and complete them in order of priority**. ✅

I’ve been using this method for quite a long time. While it hasn’t led to some grand success, it has given me something even more valuable—**momentum**. No matter how difficult things get, this system helps me keep going, one step at a time. 🔄

Before anything else, I believe that **everyone should develop their own system for recording, organizing, and structuring their projects**. No tool or method will magically fix everything unless you first have a way to manage your own work effectively. 🛠️ In my case, I refine and document six essential tasks each day as part of my project management system. 📋

Why six? Honestly, it could be five or seven—I don’t have a perfect answer. But maybe, just like how honeycombs naturally form hexagons, six is simply the most **balanced and stable number**. 🐝

That’s why I created **SixFocus**—to help structure tasks in a way that promotes **consistency and focus**. I hope this system helps you stay on track and build the momentum you need. 🚀

Let’s keep making progress, one step at a time! 💪

Introducing **Domain Management** in SixFocus! 🌟

Starting from **version 1.2.0**, you can now organize your tasks by different areas of your life—such as **work and home**—using domains. While SixFocus encourages focusing on **six key tasks per day**, domains help you structure your productivity without losing clarity. ✨

Although you can create **unlimited domains**, we recommend keeping them to a **minimum** to maintain your focus. Too many domains may **dilute your attention** rather than enhance productivity. 🎯

You can access domains through **Settings > Domains**, or by adding a **Domain icon** to the to-do list screen in **Settings > Appearance**. This feature will be available in **version 1.2.0**, which will be approved soon. 🚀 Stay tuned and enhance your workflow with SixFocus!

Unleash Your Creativity with Custom Quotes! ✨

Starting from **version 1.1.0**, SixFocus now includes the **Custom Quotes feature**, allowing you to create your own inspiring quotes or save the ones that truly resonate with you. 

Craft words that motivate you daily and keep your focus strong! 💡

Update now and personalize your inspiration! 🚀

Stay Updated with SixFocus! 🔔

Starting from **version 1.1.0**, SixFocus includes an **update notification feature** to keep you informed about the latest improvements. However, if you are using a version **below 1.1.0**, you won’t receive update alerts automatically.

If you haven’t updated yet, please manually update to the latest version to enjoy all the new features and enhancements! 🚀

Wishing you continued success in your productivity journey. Stay focused and keep achieving your goals! 💙

Keep Your Momentum Going with SixFocus! 🚀

You're doing amazing! Here's another tip to maximize your productivity: Break larger tasks into smaller, manageable steps. This makes even the most daunting goals feel achievable and keeps you motivated as you check off each step. Remember, consistency is the key to success—keep up the great work!

Discover the Power of SixFocus! 🌟

Great to see you making progress! Here’s a tip to get even more out of SixFocus: Prioritize your tasks by focusing on the most important ones first. Did you know? Completing just one high-impact task can make your entire day feel productive. Let’s keep moving forward-your goals are waiting!

Welcome to SixFocus! 📢

We’re excited to have you here. SixFocus is designed to help you manage your time effectively and achieve your goals. Set your first task and take the first step towards a more productive day! 😊
